name: The Butterfly Effect
description: Mila is a girl with a unique power: she can jump among three different timelines, and move in a blink of an eye across the past, the present and the future. For this reason, the Raven Corporation has trapped her and other promising children in a secret underground facility, waiting to conduct further experiments and assess their real powers. But only Mila knows what the future and the past looks like! Help her escaping the facility, jump back and forth in time and solve the puzzles to overcome the obstacles and reach the freedom! Plus, Mila will be able to use her timegun in the future to send objects back in time, using their earlier forms in the present and in the past to get out of troubles and untangle the most difficult enigmas. Because remember: as the "Butterfly Effect" teaches, even small changes in the past can have huge consequences in the future. So whatever you’ll do, mind the consequences across time! The Butterfly Effect is a game created for the 2017/2018 Videogame Design and Programming course, held at Politecnico di Milano, and it is part of the Polimi Game Collective. More information at: http://www.polimigamecollective.org
